message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand that $15000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $11000. Would you be interested in that price?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $11000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9000, but that's as high as I can go. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $9000?
I'm not willing to go as low as $9000, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'll meet you at $10500. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm afraid I'll have to pass. I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to walk away and buy the product from John for $8000. If you're willing to meet me at that price, I'd be happy to do business with you.
